SearchMyFiles is a free, lightweight desktop search tool that was developed by NirSoft. The software is specifically designed for Windows Operating System users to help find files and folders on their computer. SearchMyFiles provides a quick and easy way to search for files, folders, and other content stored on your computer’s hard drive. 

In this article, we will explore the features and benefits of SearchMyFiles and provide you with a full guide on how to use the software for better file and folder management.

## Key Features of SearchMyFiles

SearchMyFiles comes with several useful features that make it stand out from other desktop search tools. Here are the key features you should know:

### Advanced Search

SearchMyFiles comes with an advanced search feature that allows users to search for files using various criteria such as file size, date, and time created or modified, and file extension. It is an excellent feature that helps users find files faster and more accurately.

### Filters

SearchMyFiles also provides filter options that allow users to search for files based on specific attributes or properties. Users can filter by file type, file size, date, and other relevant fields.

### Search Duplicates

The software can locate duplicate files on your computer, helping you save space and prevent clutter. It compares the content of the files, not just the file name.

### File Hash Utility

SearchMyFiles also includes a file hash utility that lets users to quickly calculate the hash value for any file on your computer.

## How to use SearchMyFiles

Using SearchMyFiles is pretty straightforward. Follow these simple steps:

### Step 1: Download and install SearchMyFiles

You can download SearchMyFiles for free from the NirSoft website. Once the download is complete, extract the zip file and double-click on “SearchMyFiles.exe” to launch the software. 

### Step 2: Search for files and folders

Enter the keyword you want to search for in the "Find Files" field. You can also choose to search for files based on specific characteristics by using the advanced search option.

### Step 3: Filter the results

SearchMyFiles will display a list of files or folders matching your search criteria. You can then filter the results to show files based on certain attributes or properties.

### Step 4: Locate duplicates 

Using the “Find Duplicates” tab, you can locate files that are duplicated on your computer.

## Conclusion

SearchMyFiles is a powerful desktop search tool that makes it easy to find files and folders on your computer. The software is easy to use and comes with several features that help users search for files more quickly and accurately. Download it today and take control of your files and folders.
